alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 3:21AM PDT until April 13 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of one to three inches in the valleys with two to four inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers could be moderate to briefly heavy at times and bring visibility less than a mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
